game_description: Feel the thrill of shotgun shooting, hone your skills in virtual reality and challenge your friends in multiplayer competitions! Clay Hunt VR is a realistic shotgun sports game with clay shooting and bird hunting modes. Hunting season is always open! Shoot it your way! Game works with the controllers or with a gun stock accessory. Blast clays or go hunting, unlock new guns and mods like magazine for the semi-auto. Get started with the beginner difficulty and see if you can work your way up to the professional! CLAY SHOOTING: American & International trap, double trap, skeet and sporting clays with multiple courses. BIRD HUNTING: Ducks, pigeons and pheasant drives in varying bird hunting challenges! MULTIPLAYER: Join the Discord channel and participate on competitions or go shooting with friends on a private room. GUN STOCKS: Play with the controllers or a gun stock for a more realistic feel. You can calibrate most of the gun stocks but for serious practice, we recommend the Real Stock Pro from Texture VR.
review_1: Quick question ,pidgeon hunt ,long session at pro level ,I can't get past 100 yet I've been playing for 3 months almost every day.why do all the birds disappear at 15 seconds? Also I see the leader board,someone shot 198?? Who we got on here? George Digweed and Ed Solomons ? Interested to know how someone hits 198 ?
review_2: Chat me for a c0de for m0ney off! My favorite game on oculus and honestly worth buying the oculus just for this. Incredibly realistic and can be used for real life practice. Lots of game modes and gun modifications. Multiplayer is amazing as well.
review_3: I love this game and I think it has so much more potential. Hey developers do you thing you could add a pack for rough shooting? So basically walking through a field with a dog and flushing pheasants and qauil rather than just flushing qauil
review_4: Great game but I have my own gunstock, will the devs be adding a feature similar to onward where we can calibrate with gunstocks by making adjustments with the thumbsticks instead of numbers. Thanks
review_5: Unless you're extremely wealthy, you probably can't train in every area of shotguing whenever you want. Is it a perfect 1 to 1 training device? No, it can't be, but for VR, this is extremely useful, and I would recommend not only this game but also the meta quest just to get this game.
